column3: Latest; Siem Reap : Excavation work near the ------Kandal Srak Sang------ temple uncovered an ancient turtle statue on May 6
column6: said that the team at the temple had found the large turtle statue during excavations and renovating work on the temple
column7: which dates back to the 10th century.------The team discovered many other ancient artifacts
column8: including metal tools and a dragon head sculpture
column9: which is still mostly buried in the ground. ------NKD
